definitions.definition: The direct management of a project, etc. to an excessive degree, with too much attention to detail and insufficient delegation .
The management of short-term or small-scale aspects of a strategy game .

main_definition: The direct management of a project, etc. to an excessive degree, with too much attention to detail and insufficient delegation .
secondary_definitions: ( gaming ) The management of short-term or small-scale aspects of a strategy game .
